TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ApplicationEvents4_ProtectedViewWindowBeforeCloseEventHandler(ProtectedViewWindow PvWindow, int CloseReason, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed ApplicationEvents4_ProtectedViewWindowBeforeCloseEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ApplicationEvents4_ProtectedViewWindowBeforeCloseEventHandler(PvWindow As ProtectedViewWindow, CloseReason As Integer, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void ApplicationEvents4_ProtectedViewWindowBeforeCloseEventHandler(ProtectedViewWindow ^ PvWindow, int CloseReason, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

param.name: PvWindow
param.span: 关闭的受保护视图窗口。

span.span: The protected view window that is closed.

param.name: CloseReason
param.span: 中的一个常量关闭枚举，指定受保护的视图窗口的原因。

span.span: A constant in the enumeration that specifies the reason the protected view window is closed.

param.name: Cancel
param.span: 如果事件过程将此参数设置为true，完成此过程后不会关闭窗口。注意如果的一部分调用ProtectedViewWindowsBeforeClose事件方法，设置为true会生成任何操作。

span.span: If the event procedure sets this argument to true, the window does not close when the procedure is finished.NoteIf the ProtectedViewWindowsBeforeClose event is called as part of the method, setting to true produces no action.

summary.span: 用于添加事件处理程序委托类型事件。

span.span: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event.

summary.span: ProtectedViewWindowBeforeClose事件发生之前的受保护的视图窗口或受保护的视图窗口中的文档关闭。

span.span: The ProtectedViewWindowBeforeClose event occurs immediately before a protected view window or a document in a protected view window closes.
